io.digitalbits.sdk

Class KeyPair

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.digitalbits.sdk.KeyPair

  • public class KeyPair
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds a DigitalBits keypair.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KeyPair(EdDSAPublicKey publicKey)
      Creates a new KeyPair without a private key.
      KeyPair(EdDSAPublicKey publicKey, EdDSAPrivateKey privateKey)
      Creates a new KeyPair from the given public and private keys.

        KeyPair

      • fromSecretSeed

        public static KeyPair fromSecretSeed(java.lang.String seed)
        Insecure Creates a new DigitalBits KeyPair from a strkey encoded DigitalBits secret seed. This method is insecure. Use only if you are aware of security implications.
        Parameters:
        seed - The strkey encoded DigitalBits secret seed.
        Returns:
        KeyPair
        See Also:
        Using Password-Based Encryption

      • sign

        public byte[] sign(byte[] data)
        Sign the provided data with the keypair's private key.
        Parameters:
        data - The data to sign.
        Returns:
        signed bytes, null if the private key for this keypair is null.

      • signDecorated

      • verify

        public boolean verify(byte[] data,
                      byte[] signature)
        Verify the provided data and signature match this keypair's public key.
        Parameters:
        data - The data that was signed.
        signature - The signature.
        Returns:
        True if they match, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException
